name: CPA: Creature Protection Agency
description:
Created in Studio 1 (Trimester 3)

Description:

You are part of the CPA: Creature Protection Agency.

Your mission is to save endangered animals.

We have received word that there is a living family of the thought-to-be extinct Tasmanian Tigers.

You are tasked with saving the family from keeping the family from harm until an extraction crew arrives.

Use baits to lure the Tigers away from Greedy Poachers. If the Poachers are getting too close, you can also shoot the Poachers with darts to stop them from moving for a while.

Good Luck.

Controls:

Left click to throw bait

Right click to shoot darts
